headline: Medical Tourism in Tunisia | Plasfora – Certified Care & Trusted Clinics
subheadline: Discover affordable, high-quality medical treatments in Tunisia with Plasfora. From dental care to esthetic surgery and IVF, we connect you with trusted partner clinics.
about_description: Learn more about Plasfora, a digital platform dedicated to connecting patients with reliable clinics and certified specialists in Tunisia.
about_mission_desc: To make medical tourism safe, transparent, and accessible by partnering with trusted clinics and offering personalized guidance to international patients.
about_values_desc: Trust, quality, and patient-centered care drive everything we do at Plasfora.
about_professional_desc: Consult your doctor before making a decision, or reach out to a Plasfora advisor for more information.
hero_main: is a digital platform that simplifies access to world-class
hero_desc: We connect patients from around the world with partner clinics and specialists, ensuring a safe, transparent, and well-organized healthcare journey.
hero_desc_extra: From dental treatments and aesthetic surgery to fertility care and wellness holidays, Plasfora helps you find the right solution for your needs.
sticky_subtitle: Excellent medical services provided by certified professionals
timeline_subtitle: Experience world-class medical care in Tunisia. We guide you through every step of your healthcare journey with personalized support and professional expertise.
timeline_search_desc: Begin your medical journey by researching world-class facilities and treatments in Tunisia. Our platform provides comprehensive information on procedures, accredited clinics, and verified patient testimonials to help you make the best decision for your health.
timeline_search_highlight2: Transparent pricing with no hidden costs
timeline_search_highlight3: Real patient reviews and success stories
timeline_planning_desc: Our dedicated medical coordinators work with you to create a customized treatment plan. We arrange consultations, schedule procedures, and coordinate every detail to ensure your medical journey is seamless and stress-free.
timeline_planning_highlight3: Complete visa and travel documentation support
timeline_travel_desc: Experience hassle-free travel with our comprehensive concierge services. From airport pickup to private transfers, we ensure every aspect of your journey is comfortable, safe, and tailored to your medical needs.
timeline_accommodation_desc: Rest and recover in carefully selected accommodations near premier medical facilities. Our partner hotels offer specialized recovery suites with medical-grade amenities and 24/7 nursing support if needed.
timeline_accommodation_highlight2: Nutritious meal plans designed by dietitians
timeline_consultation_desc: Meet with internationally trained specialists who use advanced diagnostic technology. Our doctors take time to understand your medical history, answer all questions, and develop a personalized treatment approach.
timeline_treatment_desc: Receive treatment in internationally accredited facilities equipped with cutting-edge medical technology. Our experienced surgical teams follow the highest international standards to ensure optimal outcomes.
timeline_followup_desc: Your health journey doesn't end after treatment. We provide ongoing support through virtual follow-ups, local care coordination, and 24/7 access to your medical team for any concerns during recovery.
timeline_followup_highlight2: Medical record sharing with your home doctor
timeline_review_desc: Help future patients by sharing your experience. Your honest feedback helps us continuously improve our services and gives others confidence in choosing Tunisia for their medical care.
timeline_review_highlight2: Receive exclusive benefits for detailed reviews
tunisia_discover_desc: Experience the perfect synthesis of advanced medical care and Mediterranean charm. Tunisia offers world-class treatments in a setting that nourishes both body and soul.
tunisia_cta_desc: Our medical concierge team will create a personalized treatment plan, coordinate your travel, and ensure a seamless experience from consultation to recovery.
tunisia_benefit1: World-class medical expertise at affordable prices
tunisia_benefit2: Personalized treatment plans tailored to your needs
tunisia_feature1_desc: Experience world-class medical care at up to 70% less than European prices. Tunisia offers exceptional value without compromising on quality, making premium treatments accessible to all.
tunisia_feature2_desc: Be treated by internationally certified specialists trained in Europe's finest medical institutions. Our JCI-accredited facilities feature cutting-edge technology and personalized care protocols.
tunisia_feature3_desc: Transform your recovery into a rejuvenating retreat. Explore ancient ruins, pristine beaches, and vibrant markets as part of our holistic healing philosophy combining medical excellence with cultural enrichment.
tunisia_feature4_desc: Enjoy frictionless care from consultation to recovery. Our VIP service includes private transportation, luxury accommodation, personal medical interpreter, and customized recovery plans for ultimate peace of mind.

Enhance your appearance with safe, exper: Enhance your appearance with safe, expert-led cosmetic procedures tailored to you.
contact_subtitle: Experience personalized care from our team of specialists. We're committed to your health and wellbeing every step of the way.
contact_form_message: How can our medical team help you today?
contact_form_received: Your message has been received. Our medical team will contact you within 24 hours.
contact_cta_subtitle: Our 24/7 patient support line is always available for urgent medical questions. Speak directly with a healthcare professional.
testimonials_subtitle: Discover how our premium solutions have transformed businesses and delighted clients across industries.
